dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, have you seen this, like, article from Akorda?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, have you seen this, like, article from Akorda?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev recalled the exceptional role of women in the history of our country, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: YES! I just opened it, um, Tokayev, right? The President?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! I just opened it, um, Tokayev, right? The President?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev recalled the exceptional role of women in the history of our country, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, President Tokayev! He's just, like, praising women, uh, in Kazakhstan so much!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, President Tokayev! He's just, like, praising women, uh, in Kazakhstan so much!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev recalled the exceptional role of women in the history of our country...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: In gold letters, he says! Tomiris and Bopai Khanum, like, wow!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: In gold letters, he says! Tomiris and Bopai Khanum, like, wow!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Their names are inscribed in gold letters in the annals of the country's history. The names of the glorious rulers Tomiris and Bopai Khanum...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And the legendary mothers, Domalak Ana, Zere. It's so cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And the legendary mothers, Domalak Ana, Zere. It's so cool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the legendary mothers Domalak Ana, Zere, Ulpan...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, he goes into how they combine intelligence and beauty?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, he goes into how they combine intelligence and beauty?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the President noted, Kazakhstani women harmoniously combine intelligence and beauty, wisdom and insight.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, totally! Wisdom and insight, like, even in the hardest times, tirelessly working!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, totally! Wisdom and insight, like, even in the hardest times, tirelessly working!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even in the most difficult times, women work tirelessly for the prosperity of the Motherland.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For the Motherland! It's just, uh, incredible.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For the Motherland! It's just, uh, incredible.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Even in the most difficult times, women work tirelessly for the prosperity of the Motherland.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the whole thing about raising the younger generation, developing intellect?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the whole thing about raising the younger generation, developing intellect?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By raising a new generation of Kazakhstanis with a developed intellect and a clear mind, you contribute to the progress of our country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, how the country progresses! Their hard work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! That's, like, how the country progresses! Their hard work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many of Kazakhstan's achievements are due to the hard work of our wonderful girls and women," Tokayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So many achievements are because of them, he says!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So many achievements are because of them, he says!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Many of Kazakhstan's achievements are due to the hard work of our wonderful girls and women," Tokayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they're honoring them on March 7th! Qualified specialists.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're honoring them on March seventh! Qualified specialists.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 7, Akorda honors women - qualified specialists in various fields who make a worthy contribution to the development of the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And filling the world with beauty and harmony, creating warmth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And filling the world with beauty and harmony, creating warmth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You, dear women, fill the world with beauty and harmony, create warmth and comfort in the home.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and family values! Special mission, um, raising kids.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and family values! Special mission, um, raising kids.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You have a special mission in raising the younger generation, promoting family values.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, conscientious work in all areas! Strengthening the state.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, conscientious work in all areas! Strengthening the state.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You work conscientiously in all areas, and with your persistent and effective work you strengthen the potential and authority of our state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Happy childhood depends on, like, women being cared for. It's so true.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Happy childhood depends on, like, women being cared for. It's so true.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A happy childhood is possible only in a society where women are surrounded by attention and care.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well-being of mother and child, uh, equals the well-being of the state!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well-being of mother and child, uh, equals the well-being of the state!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The well-being of the mother and child is the key to the well-being of the state.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! They have to create all the conditions for women, it's just, like, that's key.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! They have to create all the conditions for women, it's just, like, that's key.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Therefore, the people looking to the future must create all the conditions for improving the situation of women," said Kassym-Jomart Tokayev.
